Warehouse Keeper Ballin:
Welcome! I think it's obvious that I don't hurt for money. I have a lot of customers now - everyone wants to leave their possessions at our warehouse. At this rate, I'll soon become the head of the Iron Gate Guild's office! But don't tell anyone about my ambitions!
By the way, if you leave your things here, you can then withdraw them anywhere. However, we must know for sure who will come for them.
